skills.description: Throws a punch that ignores the enemy's Defense and weakens the Attack Power for 1 turn with an 80% chance.

skills.name: Drunken Kick
skills.description: Kicks the enemy unsteadily and gets another turn if the enemy dies.

skills.name: Snake Punch
skills.description: Sharply attacks the enemy 3 times with each attack also dealing Continuous Damage for 1 turn. This attack increases the Critical Rate of all allies for 2 turns.
